languages.text: {n}Кровожадно сверкнув глазами, Злоба произносит:{/n} "Напрасно. Я уже вошел во вкус. Если я хочу услышать твои мольбы — ты будешь умолять".
{n}There is a bloodthirsty flash in Malice's eyes as he says,{/n} "You shouldn't have stopped. I have acquired a taste for your pleading. If I wish to hear you plead, you will plead."
languages.original_text: {n}Кровожадно сверкнув глазами, Злоба произносит:{/n} "Напрасно. Я уже вошел во вкус. Если я хочу услышать твои мольбы — ты будешь умолять".

traits.locale_text: {n}There is a bloodthirsty flash in Malice's eyes as he says,{/n} "You shouldn't have stopped. I have acquired a taste for your pleas. If I wish to hear them, you will plead."
traits.speaker: Anger

traits.speaker: Anger

languages.text: {n}恶棍的双眼中闪烁着嗜血的光芒。{/n}“你不该停下来，我已经品尝到了恳求的滋味。只要我想让你求我，你就必须求我。”
languages.original_text: {n}There is a bloodthirsty flash in Malice's eyes as he says,{/n} "You shouldn't have stopped. I have acquired a taste for your pleading. If I wish to hear you plead, you will plead."

traits.locale_text: {n}恶棍的双眼中闪烁着嗜血的光芒。{/n}“你不该停下来，我已经品尝到了恳求的滋味。只要我想让你求我，你就必须求我。”
traits.speaker: Anger

languages.text: {n}Hay un brillo sanguinario en los ojos de Malicia cuando habla.{/n} «No deberías haber parado. Me estaban gustando tus súplicas. Y si quiero oírte suplicar, suplicarás».
languages.original_text: {n}There is a bloodthirsty flash in Malice's eyes as he says,{/n} "You shouldn't have stopped. I have acquired a taste for your pleading. If I wish to hear you plead, you will plead."

traits.locale_text: {n}Hay un brillo sanguinario en los ojos de Malicia cuando habla.{/n} «No deberías haber parado. Me estaban gustando tus súplicas. Y si quiero oírte suplicar, suplicarás».
traits.speaker: Anger

languages.text: {n}マリスの目に血に飢えた表情が宿り、返事をした。{/n}「勝手にやめるな。貴様の懇願の味を覚えた。私がひれ伏せと言ったら、ただちにひれ伏せ」
languages.original_text: {n}There is a bloodthirsty flash in Malice's eyes as he says,{/n} "You shouldn't have stopped. I have acquired a taste for your pleading. If I wish to hear you plead, you will plead."

traits.locale_text: {n}マリスの目に血に飢えた表情が宿り、返事をした。{/n}「勝手にやめるな。貴様の懇願の味を覚えた。私がひれ伏せと言ったら、ただちにひれ伏せ」
traits.speaker: Anger

languages.text: {n}Mit vor Blutlust blitzenden Augen sagt Tücke:{/n} "Ihr hättet nicht aufhören sollen. Ich habe Gefallen an Eurem Flehen gefunden. Wenn ich Euch flehen hören möchte, dann fleht Ihr."
languages.original_text: {n}There is a bloodthirsty flash in Malice's eyes as he says,{/n} "You shouldn't have stopped. I have acquired a taste for your pleading. If I wish to hear you plead, you will plead."

traits.locale_text: {n}Mit vor Blutlust blitzenden Augen sagt Tücke:{/n} "Ihr hättet nicht aufhören sollen. Ich habe Gefallen an Eurem Flehen gefunden. Wenn ich Euch flehen hören möchte, dann fleht Ihr."
traits.speaker: Anger

languages.text: {n}Un éclair sanguinaire apparaît dans les yeux de Démon, qui dit :{/n} « Vous n'auriez pas dû vous arrêter. J'ai pris goût à vos supplications. Si j'ai envie de vous entendre me supplier, vous me supplierez. »
languages.original_text: {n}There is a bloodthirsty flash in Malice's eyes as he says,{/n} "You shouldn't have stopped. I have acquired a taste for your pleading. If I wish to hear you plead, you will plead."

traits.locale_text: {n}Un éclair sanguinaire apparaît dans les yeux de Démon, qui dit :{/n} « Vous n'auriez pas dû vous arrêter. J'ai pris goût à vos supplications. Si j'ai envie de vous entendre me supplier, vous me supplierez. »
traits.speaker: Anger

languages.text: {n}Melanet'in gözleri iştahla parlıyor.{/n} "Durmayacaktın. Yakarışların hoşuma gitmeye başlamıştı. Yalvar diyorsam yalvaracaksın."
languages.original_text: {n}There is a bloodthirsty flash in Malice's eyes as he says,{/n} "You shouldn't have stopped. I have acquired a taste for your pleading. If I wish to hear you plead, you will plead."

traits.locale_text: {n}Melanet'in gözleri iştahla parlıyor.{/n} "Durmayacaktın. Yakarışların hoşuma gitmeye başlamıştı. Yalvar, diyorsam yalvaracaksın."
traits.speaker: Anger
